name: resend_create_audience

description: Retrieve audience details by ID in Resend

description: Create a new contact in a Resend audience

description: Retrieve a contact from a Resend audience by ID or email

description: Update a contact in a Resend audience by ID or email

name: resend_delete_contact
description: Delete a contact from a Resend audience by ID or email

name: resend_list_contacts
description: List all contacts in a Resend audience
